scenario_text.value:
I too sensed some manner of presence and came
to investigate.

But my senses alone cannot tell friend from
foe, so I decided to approach cautiously.

Then Agumon arrived and simply charged
forward with reckless abandon.

Yeah, I can see that... I feel like I should
apologize for Agumon.

Agumon is convinced thereâ€™s no danger, but
I recommend caution in any case.

If you intend to investigate, be on your
guard.
